entity_types.name: Character
entity_types.description: An individual being, human or otherwise, with agency in the narrative.

entity_types.name: Location
entity_types.description: A physical or metaphysical place, ranging from cities and nations to extra-dimensional realms.

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: A formalized group with a hierarchy, purpose, or political standing.

entity_types.name: CulturalGroup
entity_types.description: An ethnic or social group defined by customs, lineage, or lifestyle rather than formal hierarchy.

entity_types.name: Artifact
entity_types.description: An object of power, historical significance, or magical utility.

entity_types.name: Species
entity_types.description: Biological or magical classifications of beings.

entity_types.name: Event
entity_types.description: A specific occurrence in time, such as a battle, treaty, or discovery.

entity_types.name: MagicalConstruct
entity_types.description: A manifestation of the One Power or True Power, or a metaphysical phenomenon.

entity_types.name: Prophecy
entity_types.description: A foretelling of future events, crucial to the pattern of the ages.

relationship_types.name: bonded_to
relationship_types.description: A magical and spiritual link between two individuals (e.g., Aes Sedai and Warder).

relationship_types.name: affiliated_with
relationship_types.description: Membership or allegiance to a group or nation.

relationship_types.name: located_in
relationship_types.description: Spatial containment of an entity within a location.

relationship_types.name: wields
relationship_types.description: The possession or utilization of an artifact or weapon.

relationship_types.name: reincarnation_of
relationship_types.description: Indicates a character possesses the soul of a past individual.

relationship_types.name: killed_by
relationship_types.description: The cause of an entity's death.

relationship_types.name: fulfills
relationship_types.description: An action or person that satisfies the conditions of a prophecy.

relationship_types.name: channels
relationship_types.description: The ability to access and manipulate a magical power source.
